name: Tower of Grudge
description:
Tower of Grudge is a 2D puzzle platformer. Player is a spirit that can possess other creatures to use their abilities and escape. In each level goal is to collect all the keys and get to exit doors. Game features around 20 levels as of today, with possible update in the future.

Controlls:

Movement: W/S/A/D

Possessing/leaving bodies: K

Jump: L
